items.title: Perplexity CEO says his AI browser will replace these two white collar jobs in every company - The Indian Express
items.summary: Perplexity CEO claims their AI browser will replace two white-collar jobs in every company, emphasizing the importance of learning about AI to stay relevant in the job market.

items.title: The AI arms race with China demands scale. The West must think bigger.

items.title: ‘Involution’: China’s problem with competition is there’s too much of it
items.summary: China is facing challenges with domestic overcompetition, which is exacerbated by Trump's tariffs, causing urgency in their efforts to address this issue.

items.title: Kyntait u Myntri ia ka jingkynnoh ba ka MEG kan aiti  ia ki skul/college sha ki riew shimet
items.summary: The Meghalaya Education Minister announced the launch of the Meghalaya Education Grant (MEG) to support schools and colleges in the state. The Voice of the People Party (VPP) leader has raised concerns about the implementation of this grant.

items.title: Grant Cardone Explains Why The 401(k) Is 'The Biggest Scam' In Finance
items.summary: Financial personality Grant Cardone criticizes 401(k) and IRA plans as 'the biggest scam' in finance.

items.title: 生成AIは“余白時間”を生み出す手段だ。 「AICA認定講師＆コンサルタント養成プロジェクト」始動！─2030年の労働力不足に備え、プロ講師と共に“正しく・本質的に活用する”組織支援モデル確立へ─
items.summary: AI-generated content creating 'margin time'; AICA launches a project to train certified instructors and consultants to establish a support model for proper and essential utilization of AI in preparation for labor shortage in 2030.

items.title: AI Benchmarks: How Companies Can Use Them to Assess Tech
items.summary: AI Benchmarks: How Companies Can Use Them to Assess Tech - Companies introduce AI models topping benchmarks, sparking competition. This allows for more effective assessment and comparison of AI technology within the industry.

items.title: Stargate Dials Back Near-Term Goal Amid Disagreement Over Data Center Sites
items.summary: Stargate's AI infrastructure project is dialing back its near-term goal due to disagreement over data center sites, experiencing a slow start six months after its announcement.

items.title: Perplexity's Comet AI Browser Wants to Dethrone Chrome on Your Phone
items.summary: Perplexity AI is looking to challenge Google Chrome on mobile phones by pre-installing its Comet browser, potentially disrupting the browser market.

items.title: AI That Feels Human: Welcome to the Next Era of Personalization
items.summary: Personalization in AI has evolved into a new era focused on conversation and connection, moving away from surveillance and segmentation. This marks a significant shift in how personalization is approached.

items.summary: Air India crash exposes ‘legal black box’ in aviation - India needs a dedicated aviation liability law embedding both civil and criminal accountability mechanisms.

items.summary: tokencostauto 0.1.144 is a tool that calculates token and translated USD cost of string and message calls to OpenAI, which can be useful for AI agents

items.title: Narwal Freo Z Ultra deal: Our favorite robot drops to lowest price since Prime Day
items.summary: Narwal's Freo Z Ultra robot vacuum is now on sale for $570 off, its lowest price since Prime Day. This deal offers a significant discount on one of the top robot vacuums available.

items.title: Agentic AI finding solid traction at enterprises on clear tech use cases
items.summary: Agentic AI gaining traction at enterprises with companies like IBM and Automation Anywhere investing in India market and setting up innovation centers to meet increasing demand in the region.

items.title: Does woman who shot Coldplay video feel sorry for Megan Kerrigan Byron? Grace Springer reveals she earned this amount from viral kiss cam clip
items.summary: The woman who shot the viral Coldplay kiss cam video reveals that she made no money from it and shares her feelings towards the subject of the video, Megan Kerrigan Byron. She clarifies that she did not earn anything from the footage.

items.title: pyCellPhenoX 1.4

items.title: If writing is thinking then what happens if AI is doing the writing and reading?
items.summary: The news explores the implications of AI taking over the tasks of writing and reading. It delves into the question of how AI's involvement in these areas may impact various aspects of society.

items.title: NXP delivers bullish guidance despite declining revenue, but investors were not convinced
items.summary: NXP Semiconductors N.V. delivered bullish guidance despite declining revenue, but investors were not convinced as the stock faltered in after-hours trading. The company's forecast for the second quarter was less bullish than some investors had hoped for.

items.title: Amid rains, AI flight overshoots city runway
items.summary: An Air India aircraft overshot the Mumbai airport runway due to heavy rains, showcasing the application of AI technology in aviation. The incident highlights the importance of optimizing AI systems for extreme weather conditions to ensure safe flights.

items.title: PBK Miner launches the first XRP cloud mining platform, leading the Ripple cloud mining revolution, using XRP to earn daily passive income
items.summary: PBK Miner launches the first XRP cloud mining platform, leading the Ripple cloud mining revolution, using XRP to earn daily passive income. Riding on the bullish momentum of XRP’s recovery, PBKMiner announced the official launch of its AI-powered XRP cloud mining contracts — daily payouts, zero hardware, and full automation are now available to users worldwide.
